name: Mad Gardener: Zombie Massacre
description: Fast paced top-down shooter/bullet storm where the player takes the role of aspiring rockstar who deals with ugly monsters using mighty weapons mounted on his electric guitar.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Generic sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550Ti or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Generic sound card
